summary: I always thought the Vampire Lord form was too large, camera nearly hitting roofs in small places, hitting doors with head, etc.; so I had a look and couldn't find any mods that do this.. So I decided to do it myself. Very simple mod.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD

I always thought the Vampire Lord form was too large, camera nearly hitting roofs in small places, hitting doors with head, etc.; so I had a look and couldn't find any mods that do this.. So I decided to do it myself. Very simple mod.

Makes you about the height of an average person. Should work with Male and Female forms. Haven't tested female myself.

Shouldn't be incompatible with any mods that affect Vampire Lords, just tell me if there's any issues with it.
author: nadiayorc
